title: Ep 214 | Phil, Willie & Mistaken Identity, Jase's Epic Triduckathon & the Stand-Up Moment Challenge
description:
Jase's obstacle-filled "triduckathon" includes wading through a sea of raccoon crap and doing battle with a ball of fire ants. The guys remember the time Willie's expensive coffee was ruined when someone mistook him for a homeless person, and Phil recalls being directed to a shelter. Jase offers a blueprint for reaching people with Jesus and describes his pivotal "stand-up moment." And Al closes it out with a challenge for Unashamed Nation.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
